choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Python program
Write a function named capital_indexes. The function takes a single parameter, which is a string. Your function should return a list of all the indexes in the string that have capital letters

### Response:


Certainly! If you provide the input "Python program" where all capital letters are found, our job is to create a new Python script based on user inputs. Please provide any additional information about your project needs and we will be happy to assist further research or application development.*
